item.title: Cynthia M. Lummis bio
item.description: Senator Cynthia Lummis Biograph Senator Cynthia Marie Lummis Wiederspahn (R) is an American politician. She is serving as a junior US Senator from Wyoming. She was a member of the state’s House of Representatives. She also served in the Wyoming Senate before her election to the US House of Representatives. Lummis was born in Cheyenne, Wyoming, on September 10, 1954. Senator Cynthia Lummis attended Cheyenne East High School. She earned her Bachelor’s degree in Animal Science from the University of Wyoming in 1976.
